comments:
Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a very simple XML document. Here's the one I used, but a simpler one will probably work:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ASCII"?>
<kdm:KDMSegment xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:action="http://kdm.omg.org/action" xmlns:build="http://kdm.omg.org/build" xmlns:code="http://kdm.omg.org/code" xmlns:kdm="http://kdm.omg.org/kdm">
</kdm:KDMSegment>

2. Save it in a file called "test.kdm"
3. Right click on the file in the Package Explorer.
4. Select "Open With -> Other..."
4. Select the XML editor.

More information:
Here's the stack trace produced:
